description: The round payoff this round was 81. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 1. You received a payoff of 40.5.
Mutual cooperation by choosing Option 1 leads to an equal and maximized payoff for both players
Deviating to Option 2 when the other player chooses Option 1 results in a lower individual payoff compared to mutual cooperation
The game encourages repeated cooperation for consistent fair outcomes, as this memory shows no defection and equal sharing
